description: The sandboxing mechanism must be applied to the core Jint engine.
The frontend Monaco editor UI requires the backend CRUD API for scripts to be functional.
mitigation_plan: Define and mock the API contract early to allow parallel development.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks all frontend development for script management.

description: Backup and recovery procedures cannot be finalized until the versioning database schema is implemented.
mitigation_plan: Technical writer to sync with backend developer once schema is stable.
